rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance porch with wooden pillars and sloped roof.
Spacious living room with high ceiling, wooden flooring, and large windows for natural light.
Dining room adjacent to the kitchen with traditional Kerala-style furniture and decor.
Modern kitchen with traditional Kerala elements, equipped with essential appliances on a budget.
Master bedroom with attached bathroom and balcony, following Vastu principles for harmony.
Standard bedroom with attached bathroom and access to the private gym.
Private gym with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Traditional wooden gate at the entrance of the house.
Large window in the living room for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Standard bedroom on the first floor with attached bathroom and balcony.
Another standard bedroom on the first floor with attached bathroom and balcony.

openings.description: Large window in bedroom 3 for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Standard bedroom on the second floor with attached bathroom and balcony.
